******************************************************
Test #1: Stress, s11
 
Code:

      integer :: i, j
      real(dp) :: res(11,11)
      real(dp) :: x, y
      real(dp) :: s11, s22, tau
      real(dp) :: mu, nu, burgers
      call initMaterialData('example_materials_test2')
      mu = 20.0_dp
      nu = 0.3_dp
      burgers = 2.0_dp
      materials(1)%mu = mu
      materials(1)%nu = nu
      materials(1)%burgers = burgers
      materials(1)%dispprefac = 0.25_dp*burgers/(piconst*(1.0_dp-nu))
      materials(1)%stressprefac =0.5_dp*burgers*mu/(piconst*(1.0_dp-nu))
      do i = 1, 11
      x = -2.5_dp + (i - 1.0_dp)*0.5_dp
      do j = 1, 11
            y = 2.5_dp - (j - 1.0_dp)*0.5_dp
            call getStressAtPointSub(x,y,1,1,1.0_dp,s11,s22,tau)
            res(j,i) = s11
      end do
      end do
      call prettyPrintMat(res,'Stress, s11')

Output: (Checked with Python module dislfields --- see iPython Notebook 'Dislocation Fields.ipynb')

Test #2: Stress, s22
 
Code:

      integer :: i, j
      real(dp) :: res(11,11)
      real(dp) :: x, y
      real(dp) :: s11, s22, tau
      real(dp) :: mu, nu, burgers
      call initMaterialData('example_materials_test2')
      mu = 20.0_dp
      nu = 0.3_dp
      burgers = 2.0_dp
      materials(1)%mu = mu
      materials(1)%nu = nu
      materials(1)%burgers = burgers
      materials(1)%dispprefac = 0.25_dp*burgers/(piconst*(1.0_dp-nu))
      materials(1)%stressprefac =0.5_dp*burgers*mu/(piconst*(1.0_dp-nu))
      do i = 1, 11
      x = -2.5_dp + (i - 1.0_dp)*0.5_dp
      do j = 1, 11
            y = 2.5_dp - (j - 1.0_dp)*0.5_dp
            call getStressAtPointSub(x,y,1,1,1.0_dp,s11,s22,tau)
            res(j,i) = s22
      end do
      end do
      call prettyPrintMat(res,'Stress, s22')

Test #3: Stress, s12

Code:

      integer :: i, j
      real(dp) :: res(11,11)
      real(dp) :: x, y
      real(dp) :: s11, s22, tau
      real(dp) :: mu, nu, burgers
      call initMaterialData('example_materials_test2')
      mu = 20.0_dp
      nu = 0.3_dp
      burgers = 2.0_dp
      materials(1)%mu = mu
      materials(1)%nu = nu
      materials(1)%burgers = burgers
      materials(1)%dispprefac = 0.25_dp*burgers/(piconst*(1.0_dp-nu))
      materials(1)%stressprefac =0.5_dp*burgers*mu/(piconst*(1.0_dp-nu))
      do i = 1, 11
      x = -2.5_dp + (i - 1.0_dp)*0.5_dp
      do j = 1, 11
            y = 2.5_dp - (j - 1.0_dp)*0.5_dp
            call getStressAtPointSub(x,y,1,1,1.0_dp,s11,s22,tau)
            res(j,i) = tau
      end do
      end do
      call prettyPrintMat(res,'Stress, s12')
